title: No longer have access to my email
body: My main email account was hacked so I need to move all my gaming accounts to a new email. Can someone from riot please help?

replies.body: Hit up the account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking the "I need help recovering my account" field. After you verify yourself as the creator of the account they should be able to help with getting that changed.
